PackageOracle.name: DA_CUST_ACCOUNT_ENTITLMNT_TOKE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CUST_ACCOUNT_ENTITLMNT_TOKE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.50.011918000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke;

body.name: DA_CUST_ACCOUNT_ENTITLMNT_TOKE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUST_ACCOUNT_ENTITLMNT_TOKE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.50.021695000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke.add, parms=' || customer_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || entitlement_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_cust_account_entitlmnt_token a
(
a.customer_id
,a.account_id
,a.entitlement_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.customer_id
,add.account_id
,add.entitlement_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke.del, parms=' || customer_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || entitlement_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_cust_account_entitlmnt_token a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customer_id = del.customer_id
AND a.account_id = del.account_id
AND a.entitlement_id = del.entitlement_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke.del');

END del;

END da_cust_account_entitlmnt_toke;
